name: Run away 2
description:
Run away 2 is a scary story about a teenage boy who can’t stand one of his teachers. After a series of bizarre accidents, he begins to suspect that the teacher may somehow be involved.

Run away 2 is a short Visual Novel with next features:
  • interesting and horrifying storyline
  • nice art style, backgrounds
  • relaxing backround music
  • a lot of Steam Achievements
